price: 32. Y todos (los hombres) sin excepción comparecerán ante Nosotros (para ser juzgados).
arabic: وَإِن كُلّٞ لَّمَّا جَمِيعٞ لَّدَيۡنَا مُحۡضَرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wa-in kullun lammā jamīʿun ladaynā muḥ'ḍarūna
